title: I know others have said this, but...
body:
Please for the love of god change the LP loss for dodging games in the que. Nobody dodges without a reason, and it prevents toxic games.
You literally have to choose whether you don't mind dropping a rank, or you want to deal with people that are already toxic before the game starts. Ranked would be so much better, really. I get that some people would abuse it and that it's partially necessary, but if we could all have like 2 free dodges that would be amazing. It wouldn't be abusable that way, and it would make ranked less infuriating.

*Edited for correct clarity

replies.body: Eh, it's still annoying that you get punished for dodging lobbies like that.

It's only LP, as long as it doesn't tank your MMR I don't see a problem.  How often do you *actually* need to dodge?  As long as your MMR is somewhere near your division, that LP can be easily made up with a single win (or half a win if your MMR is really high).

That's useful and really needed, but doesn't really address the issue I'm talking about.
I know it's old and trivial to some (hence the down votes) but I'm really sick of people not paying attention to what roles have already been taken.
Am I REALLY the only one that isn't OK with calling mid (as an example), picking a mid champ, and having the last person on the team also pick a mid champ and completely screws the team comp and the entire game?
I think they are making up for this by giving chat restrictions to toxic people.....
